channel.title: Loose Items on Death
channel.description:
Hi,
I have Berky-Scape source [508] And I wondering if anyone knew how to make it so that it looses items upon death in BOUNTY HUNTER, as atm WILDY and BH are SAFE and you loose no items, i want Wildy safe and BH loose on Death. Thank You.
